tags: Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF

## Description
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals for the procurement of Safety Relief Valves to meet the maritime needs of the Canadian Armed Forces.

## Items to be Procured
The following items are required:

* Item 1: VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF, NSN: 01-210-4144 (24 EA) - to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 2: VALVE, SAFETY RELIEF, NSN: 01-210-4144 (24 EA) - to be delivered to CFB Halifax

## Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Number: W8482-230973/C
* Date of Publication: 2023-04-21
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-05-31T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-06-01
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-03-31

## Trade Agreements and Conditions

* This solicitation is open to all qualified suppliers.
* Presentments in either official language of Canada (English or French) are accepted.
* Suppliers must submit prices in Canadian dollars; bids in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

## Request for Price and Technical Proposal

Prospective bidders must submit a Proposal that includes:

1. A detailed description of the Goods proposed, including relevant specifications and performance requirements.
2. A price, in Canadian dollars, for the proposed Goods.
3. Any certification or documentation required for Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA) or other applicable trade agreements.

## Contact Information

Jean-Pierre Normandin, Contracting Officer
Department of National Defence
101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
E-mail: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca
 Telephone:(819) 939-3674

## Tender Documents

Tender documents can be accessed on the Government of Canada's procurement website, https://canadabuys.canada.ca/.

A word of caution and suggestion to you
